cnd17:2.3: Paṭhamenapi jhānena jhāyī, dutiyenapi jhānena jhāyī, tatiyenapi jhānena jhāyī, catutthenapi jhānena jhāyī, savitakkasavicārenapi jhānena jhāyī, avitakkavicāramattenapi jhānena jhāyī, avitakkaavicārenapi jhānena jhāyī, sappītikenapi jhānena jhāyī, nippītikenapi jhānena jhāyī, sātasahagatenapi jhānena jhāyī, upekkhāsahagatenapi jhānena jhāyī, suññatenapi jhānena jhāyī, animittenapi jhānena jhāyī, appaṇihitenapi jhānena jhāyī, lokiyenapi jhānena jhāyī, lokuttarenapi jhānena jhāyī jhānarato ekattamanuyutto sadatthagarukoti—
cnd17:2.5: **Virajan**ti rāgo rajo, doso rajo, moho rajo, kodho rajo, upanāho rajo …pe… sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā rajā.
cnd17:2.6: Te rajā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd17:2.7: Tasmā buddho arajo virajo nirajo rajāpagato rajavippahīno rajavippayutto sabbarajavītivatto.
cnd17:3.1: Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
cnd17:4.1: Doso rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
cnd17:5.1: Moho rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
cnd17:8.2: Atha vā bhagavā sabbossukkapaṭippassaddhattā āsīno vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe… jātimaraṇasaṃsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti.
cnd17:10.1: **Katakiccaṃ anāsavan**ti buddhassa bhagavato kiccākiccaṃ karaṇīyākaraṇīyaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ.
cnd17:12.4: Te āsavā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
cnd17:13.1: **Pāraguṃ sabbadhammānan**ti bhagavā sabbadhammānaṃ abhiññāpāragū pariññāpāragū pahānapāragū bhāvanāpāragū sacchikiriyāpāragū samāpattipāragū.
cnd17:13.2: Abhiññāpāragū sabbadhammānaṃ, pariññāpāragū sabbadukkhānaṃ, pahānapāragū sabbakilesānaṃ, bhāvanāpāragū catunnaṃ maggānaṃ, sacchikiriyāpāragū nirodhassa, samāpattipāragū sabbasamāpattīnaṃ.
cnd17:13.7: So pāragato pārappatto antagato antappatto koṭigato koṭippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosānagato vosānappatto tāṇagato tāṇappatto leṇagato leṇappatto saraṇagato saraṇappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbānagato nibbānappatto.
cnd17:13.8: So vuttavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe… jātimaraṇasaṃsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti—
cnd17:14.1: **Atthi pañhena āgaman**ti pañhena atthiko āgatomhi, pañhaṃ pucchitukāmo āgatomhi, pañhaṃ sotukāmo āgatomhīti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.
cnd17:14.2: Atha vā pañhatthikānaṃ pañhaṃ pucchitukāmānaṃ pañhaṃ sotukāmānaṃ āgamanaṃ abhikkamanaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ payirupāsanaṃ atthīti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.
cnd17:14.3: Atha vā pañhāgamo tuyhaṃ atthi, tvampi pahu tvamasi alamatto mayā pucchitaṃ kathetuṃ visajjetuṃ, vahassetaṃ bhāranti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.
cnd17:15.2: Arahattavimokkhaṃ pabrūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti—
cnd17:16.1: **Avijjāya pabhedanan**ti avijjāya bhedanaṃ pabhedanaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhaṃ amataṃ nibbānanti—
cnd17:19.2: **Chando**ti yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasineho kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmupādānaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ.
cnd17:19.3: **Pahānaṃ kāmacchandānan**ti kāmacchandānaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti—
cnd17:20.2: **Domanassā**ti yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ, cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā.
cnd17:20.3: **Domanassāna cūbhayan**ti kāmacchandassa ca domanassassa ca ubhinnaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti—
cnd17:21.2: **Thinan**ti yā cittassa akalyatā akammaññatā olīyanā sallīyanā līnā līyanā līyitattaṃ thinaṃ thiyanā thiyitattaṃ cittassa.
cnd17:21.3: **Panūdanan**ti thinassa ca panūdanaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti—
cnd17:22.2: **Kukkuccan**ti hatthakukkuccampi kukkuccaṃ, pādakukkuccampi kukkuccaṃ, hatthapādakukkuccampi kukkuccaṃ.
cnd17:22.5: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ kukkuccaṃ kukkuccāyanā kukkuccāyitattaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho, idaṃ vuccati kukkuccaṃ.
cnd17:22.6: Api ca dvīhi kāraṇehi uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho—
cnd17:22.8: Kathaṃ katattā ca akatattā ca uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho?
cnd17:22.9: “Kataṃ me kāyaduccaritaṃ, akataṃ me kāyasucaritan”ti uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
cnd17:22.12: “kato me pāṇātipāto, akatā me pāṇātipātā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.13: “kataṃ me adinnādānaṃ, akatā me adinnādānā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.14: “kato me kāmesumicchācāro, akatā me kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.15: “kato me musāvādo, akatā me musāvādā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.16: “katā me pisuṇā vācā, akatā me pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.17: “katā me pharusā vācā, akatā me pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.18: “kato me samphappalāpo, akatā me samphappalāpā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.21: “katā me micchādiṭṭhi, akatā me sammādiṭṭhī”ti, uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
cnd17:22.22: Evaṃ katattā ca akatattā ca uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
cnd17:23.1: Atha vā “sīlesumhi aparipūrakārī”ti uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho;
cnd17:23.6: “abhāvitā me cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti, cattāro sammappadhānāti cattāro iddhipādāti, pañcindriyānīti, pañca balānīti, satta bojjhaṅgāti, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti …
cnd17:23.7: “dukkhaṃ me apariññātaṃ, samudayo me appahīno, maggo me abhāvito, nirodho me asacchikato”ti uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
cnd17:24.1: **Kukkuccānaṃ nivāraṇan**ti kukkuccānaṃ āvaraṇaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ pahānaṃ upasamaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti—
cnd17:27.2: **Upekkhā**ti yā catutthe jhāne upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā cittasamatā cittappassaddhatā majjhattatā cittassa.
cnd17:27.3: **Satī**ti yā catutthe jhāne upekkhaṃ ārabbha sati anussati …pe… sammāsati.
cnd17:27.4: **Upekkhāsatisaṃsuddhan**ti catutthe jhāne upekkhā ca sati ca suddhā honti visuddhā saṃsuddhā parisuddhā pariyodātā anaṅgaṇā vigatūpakkilesā mudubhūtā kammaniyā ṭhitā āneñjappattāti—
cnd17:28.2: So ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti, evampi dhammatakkapurejavaṃ.
cnd17:28.4: Sā ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti, evampi dhammatakkapurejavaṃ.
cnd17:28.5: Atha vā dhammatakko vuccati catunnaṃ maggānaṃ pubbabhāgavipassanā.
cnd17:28.6: Sā ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti—
cnd17:29.2: Arahattavimokkhaṃ pabrūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti—
cnd17:30.3: **Pabhedanan**ti avijjāya pabhedanaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti—
cnd17:33.1: **Kiṃsu saṃyojano loko**ti lokassa saṃyojanaṃ lagganaṃ bandhanaṃ upakkileso.
cnd17:33.2: Kena loko yutto payutto āyutto samāyutto laggo laggito palibuddhoti—
cnd17:34.1: **Kiṃsu tassa vicāraṇan**ti kiṃsu tassa cāraṇaṃ vicāraṇaṃ paṭivicāraṇaṃ.
cnd17:34.4: **Kissassa vippahānena nibbānaṃ iti vuccatī**ti kissassa vippahānena vūpasamena paṭinissaggena paṭippassaddhiyā nibbānaṃ iti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyatīti—
cnd17:37.2: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati nandī.
cnd17:37.3: Yā nandī lokassa saṃyojanaṃ lagganaṃ bandhanaṃ upakkileso, imāya nandiyā loko yutto payutto āyutto samāyutto laggo laggito palibuddhoti—
cnd17:38.3: kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko, vihiṃsāvitakko, ñātivitakko janapadavitakko, amarāvitakko, parānudayatāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakko.
cnd17:38.5: Ime nava vitakkā lokassa cāraṇā vicāraṇā paṭivicāraṇā.
cnd17:38.6: Imehi navahi vitakkehi loko carati vicarati paṭivicaratīti—
cnd17:39.3: **Taṇhāya vippahānena nibbānaṃ iti vuccatī**ti taṇhāya vippahānena vūpasamena paṭinissaggena paṭippassaddhiyā nibbānaṃ iti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyatīti—
cnd17:42.1: **Kathaṃ satassa carato**ti kathaṃ satassa sampajānassa carato viharato iriyato vattayato pālayato yapayato yāpayatoti—
cnd17:43.1: **Viññāṇaṃ uparujjhatī**ti viññāṇaṃ nirujjhati vūpasammati atthaṃ gacchati paṭippassambhatīti—
cnd17:44.1: **Bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamā**ti buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhuṃ pucchituṃ yācituṃ ajjhesituṃ pasādetuṃ āgamhā āgatamhā upāgatamhā sampattamhā, “tayā saddhiṃ samāgatamhā”ti—
cnd17:45.2: **Tan**ti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ suṇoma uggaṇhāma dhārema upadhārema upalakkhemāti—
cnd17:48.1: **Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca vedanaṃ nābhinandato**ti ajjhattaṃ vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti;
cnd17:48.2: bahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti;
cnd17:48.3: ajjhattabahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti.
cnd17:49.1: Ajjhattaṃ samudayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti;
cnd17:49.4: bahiddhā samudayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti;
cnd17:49.9: ajjhattabahiddhā samudayavayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti.
cnd17:49.10: Imehi dvādasahi ākārehi vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto …pe…
cnd17:50.1: Atha vā vedanaṃ aniccato passanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti.
cnd17:50.2: Vedanaṃ dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato …pe…
cnd17:50.3: nissaraṇato passanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti.
cnd17:50.4: Imehi cattālīsāya ākārehi vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametīti—
cnd17:51.1: **Evaṃ satassa carato**ti evaṃ satassa sampajānassa carato viharato iriyato vattayato pālayato yapayato yāpayatoti—
cnd17:52.1: **Viññāṇaṃ uparujjhatī**ti puññābhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ apuññābhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ āneñjābhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ nirujjhati vūpasammati atthaṃ gacchati paṭippassambhatīti—
